General.Name: ROPEOK Technology Group Co Ltd
General.Description: ROPEOK Technology Group Co.,Ltd. designs and implements security system solutions and services in China. The company engages in the development, sale, operation, and maintenance of security video surveillance products; and provides and other services. Its products include web video, structured, face, and traffic bayonet cameras, as well as dual light thermometers. The company also offers Portrait AI Platform, a cloud platform combines AI and big data; Vehicle AI Platform for vehicle inspection and violation detection; Multidimensional AI Platform, for multi-dimensional fusion and image search; 3D AI Stereo Platform to build a combat-oriented digital map; and Roput Video Integrated Management Platform that provides unified access, secure storage, and centralized management of video data. In addition, it provides AI operation and maintenance platform, business application monitoring and operation and maintenance management system; AR Holographic Platform, that provides real-time scheduling, management, and command to support business applications; AI emergency command platform for support face, vehicle, and GPS data aggregation; full life cycle operation platform; and AIoT Security Platform. Its solutions cover security, education, city, energy, transportation, life, agriculture, ecology, and medical areas. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in in Xiamen, China.
